DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective chart review to gather information on Sensipar patterns of use and effects on biochemical parameters in renal transplant recipients
DOC.criteria: Adults >= 18 years old Subjects who have received Sensipar for a duration of at least 3 months, beginning at least 3 months after a kidney transplant. Subjects must have begun Sensipar teatment no later than Februry 28, 2005 at treating physician's discretion. Subjects who received Sensipar before undergoing a kidney transplant Subjects receiving dialysis posttransplant
